preamble: Please specifiy all the preprocessing decisions in this section, such as analysis software, off-line filtering, re-referencing, artefact removal, epoching and baseline.

details: this is a fake loop hack - we will offer up to N steps (currently only 2 while this is in development) - and then steps are only visible if a person has picked a total number of steps that is equal to or higher :)

question: How did you define your artifacts in step 1?
choices: visual inspection | algorithm | pre-set numerical criterion | other

question: What action did you take regarding artifacts in step 1?
choices: reject bad participant | reject bad trial or bad data segment | remove bad electrode | interpolate bad electrode | correct by subtraction (blinks, EKG etc.)
